entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
